00026 #ifndef NOISEPP_PIPELINE_H
00027 #define NOISEPP_PIPELINE_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoisePrerequisites.h"
00030 
00031 namespace noisepp
00032 {
00033         class Module;
00034 
00036         struct Cache
00037         {
00039                 Real value;
00041                 bool filled;
00043                 Real x;
00045                 Real y;
00047                 Real z;
00049                 Cache () : value(0), filled(false) {}
00050         };
00051 
00053         class PipelineJob
00054         {
00055                 public:
00057                         virtual ~PipelineJob () {}
00060                         virtual void execute (Cache *cache) = 0;
00063                         virtual void finish () {}
00064         };
00065 
00067         typedef std::queue<PipelineJob*> PipelineJobQueue;
00068 
00076         template <class Element>
00077         class Pipeline
00078         {
00079                 private:
00080                         int mSeed;
00081 
00082                 protected:
00084                         std::vector<Element*> mElements;
00086                         std::map<const Module*, ElementID> mElementIDs;
00088                         PipelineJobQueue mJobs;
00089 
00090                 public:
00092                         Pipeline () : mSeed(0)
00093                         {
00094                         }
00096                         NOISEPP_INLINE Element *getElement (ElementID i) const
00097                         {
00098                                 NoiseAssertRange (i, mElements.size());
00099                                 return mElements[i];
00100                         }
00102                         ElementID getElementCount () const
00103                         {
00104                                 return mElements.size ();
00105                         }
00108                         void setSeed (int seed)
00109                         {
00110                                 mSeed = seed;
00111                         }
00113                         int getSeed () const
00114                         {
00115                                 return mSeed;
00116                         }
00121                         Cache *createCache () const
00122                         {
00123                                 return new Cache[mElements.size()];
00124                         }
00127                         NOISEPP_INLINE void cleanCache (Cache *cache) const
00128                         {
00129                                 memset (cache, 0, sizeof(Cache)*mElements.size());
00130                         }
00132                         void freeCache (Cache *cache) const
00133                         {
00134                                 delete[] cache;
00135                         }
00138                         ElementID addElement (const Module *parent, Element *element)
00139                         {
00140                                 NoiseAssert (element != NULL, element);
00141                                 NoiseAssert (parent != NULL, parent);
00142                                 std::map<const Module*, ElementID>::iterator it = mElementIDs.find(parent);
00143                                 if (it != mElementIDs.end())
00144                                 {
00145                                         delete element;
00146                                         return it->second;
00147                                 }
00148                                 ElementID id = mElements.size ();
00149                                 mElementIDs.insert (std::make_pair(parent, id));
00150                                 mElements.push_back(element);
00151                                 return id;
00152                         }
00154                         ElementID getElementID (const Module *module) const
00155                         {
00156                                 std::map<const Module*, ElementID>::const_iterator it = mElementIDs.find(module);
00157                                 if (it != mElementIDs.end())
00158                                         return it->second;
00159                                 return ELEMENTID_INVALID;
00160                         }
00162                         inline ElementID getElementID (const Module &module) const
00163                         {
00164                                 return getElementID(&module);
00165                         }
00167                         Element *getElementPtr (const Module *module) const
00168                         {
00169                                 std::map<const Module*, ElementID>::const_iterator it = mElementIDs.find(module);
00170                                 if (it != mElementIDs.end())
00171                                         return getElement(it->second);
00172                                 return 0;
00173                         }
00175                         inline Element *getElementPtr (const Module &module) const
00176                         {
00177                                 return getElementPtr(&module);
00178                         }
00180                         virtual void addJob (PipelineJob *job)
00181                         {
00182                                 NoiseAssert (job != NULL, job);
00183                                 mJobs.push (job);
00184                         }
00186                         virtual void executeJobs ()
00187                         {
00188                                 Cache *cache = createCache();
00189                                 PipelineJob *job;
00190                                 while (!mJobs.empty())
00191                                 {
00192                                         job = mJobs.front ();
00193                                         mJobs.pop ();
00194                                         job->execute(cache);
00195                                         job->finish();
00196                                         delete job;
00197                                 }
00198                                 freeCache (cache);
00199                         }
00201                         virtual ~Pipeline ()
00202                         {
00203                                 typename std::vector<Element*>::iterator itEnd = mElements.end();
00204                                 for (typename std::vector<Element*>::iterator it=mElements.begin();it!=itEnd;++it)
00205                                 {
00206                                         delete *it;
00207                                 }
00208                                 mElements.clear ();
00209                                 mElementIDs.clear ();
00210                                 while (!mJobs.empty())
00211                                 {
00212                                         delete mJobs.front ();
00213                                         mJobs.pop ();
00214                                 }
00215                         }
00216         };
00217 
00225         typedef Pipeline<PipelineElement1D> Pipeline1D;
00233         typedef Pipeline<PipelineElement2D> Pipeline2D;
00241         typedef Pipeline<PipelineElement3D> Pipeline3D;
00242 
00243         class PipelineElement1D
00244         {
00245                 protected:
00246                         NOISEPP_INLINE Real getElementValue (const PipelineElement1D *elementPtr, ElementID element, Real x, Cache *cache) const
00247                         {
00248                                 if (cache[element].filled && cache[element].x == x)
00249                                 {
00250                                         return cache[element].value;
00251                                 }
00252                                 else
00253                                 {
00254                                         cache[element].filled = true;
00255                                         cache[element].x = x;
00256                                         return (cache[element].value = elementPtr->getValue(x, cache));
00257                                 }
00258                         }
00259 
00260                         bool mCached;
00261                 public:
00262                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Cache *cache) const = 0;
00263                         virtual ~PipelineElement1D () {}
00264         };
00265 
00266         class PipelineElement2D
00267         {
00268                 protected:
00269                         NOISEPP_INLINE Real getElementValue (const PipelineElement2D *elementPtr, ElementID element, Real x, Real y, Cache *cache) const
00270                         {
00271                                 if (cache[element].filled && cache[element].x == x && cache[element].y == y)
00272                                 {
00273                                         return cache[element].value;
00274                                 }
00275                                 else
00276                                 {
00277                                         cache[element].filled = true;
00278                                         cache[element].x = x;
00279                                         cache[element].y = y;
00280                                         return (cache[element].value = elementPtr->getValue(x, y, cache));
00281                                 }
00282                         }
00283 
00284                 public:
00285                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Cache *cache) const = 0;
00286                         virtual ~PipelineElement2D () {}
00287         };
00288 
00289         class PipelineElement3D
00290         {
00291                 protected:
00292                         NOISEPP_INLINE Real getElementValue (const PipelineElement3D *elementPtr, ElementID element, Real x, Real y, Real z, Cache *cache) const
00293                         {
00294                                 if (cache[element].filled && cache[element].x == x && cache[element].y == y && cache[element].z == z)
00295                                 {
00296                                         return cache[element].value;
00297                                 }
00298                                 else
00299                                 {
00300                                         cache[element].filled = true;
00301                                         cache[element].x = x;
00302                                         cache[element].y = y;
00303                                         cache[element].z = z;
00304                                         return (cache[element].value = elementPtr->getValue(x, y, z, cache));
00305                                 }
00306                         }
00307 
00308                 public:
00309                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Real z, Cache *cache) const = 0;
00310                         virtual ~PipelineElement3D () {}
00311         };
00312 };
00313 
00314 #endif
